title: Northern Trust chooses Clearstream for its fund custody business (Deutsche Börse AG)
text: ( Source : Deutsche Börse AG) 12 . October 2015 Clearstream:- Clearstream's one-stop shop solution for third party fundsprocessing was key decision criteria - As a major market player with USD 6.1 trillion in assets under custody and USD 960
